text: The Bowls England National Championships (Women's Senior Pairs) is one of the events at the annual Bowls England National Championships. ==Past Winners== {|class="sortable wikitable" |- !width="30"|Year !width="400"|Champion !width="400"|Runner-up |- | align=center|2008|| Brenda Thomas & Sue Springell (Buckinghamshire) ||Hazel Bass & Anne Hadley (Huntingdonshire) |- | align=center|2009||Margaret McColl & Pam Margrett (Gloucestershire) ||Mary Taylor & Kay Kerley (Hampshire) |- | align=center|2010||Gwen Xuereb & Geraldine Reeve (Norfolk) ||Teresa Pearson & Gill Jones (Durham) |- | align=center|2011||Teresa Pearson & Gill Jones (Durham) ||Lydia Munn & Carol Morton (Kent) |- | align=center|2012||Judith Staunton & Joan Walmsley (Somerset) ||Joyce Jones & Janet Cropper (Lancashire) |- | align=center|2013||Ingar Newman & Norma Beales (Surrey) ||Karen Tandler & Marian Wheatley (Herefordshire) |- | align=center|2014||Yvonne Woodcock & Wendy Davies (Sussex) ||Carole Robertson & Pamela Armstrong (Buckinghamshire) |- | align=center|2015||Pat Logan & Marjorie Crowe (Worcestershire)|| Judy Bacon & Beverley Wall (Berkshire) |- | align=center|2016||Carol Inserra & Lynn Green (Leicestershire)||Linda Challenger & Lindsay Collin (Gloucestershire) |- | align=center|2017||Lesley Johnson & Margaret Holden (Hampshire)||Rita Gerry & Julia Stannard (Gloucestershire) |- | align=center|2018||Glynis Morgan & Joan Rodgerson (Durham) ||Lesley Johnson & Margaret Holden (Hampshire) |- | align=center|2019||Lorraine Hume & Rachel Mackriell (Sussex) ||Pat Clarke & Christine Webb (Norfolk) |- |align=center|2020|| cancelled || due to the COVID-19 pandemic. |} ==References== Category:Bowls in England
title: Bowls England National Championships (Women's Senior Pairs)
